content.1: Then came near the heads of the fathers of the Levites unto Eleazar the priest, and unto Joshua the son of Nun, and unto the heads of the fathers of the tribes of the children of Israel;
content.2: And they spake unto them at Shiloh in the land of Canaan, saying, The
content.3: And the children of Israel gave unto the Levites out of their inheritance, at the commandment of the
content.4: And the lot came out for the families of the Kohathites: and the children of Aaron the priest,
content.5: And the rest of the children of Kohath

content.9: And they gave out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, these cities which are
content.11: And they gave them the city of Arba the father of Anak, which
content.12: But the fields of the city, and the villages thereof, gave they to Caleb the son of Jephunneh for his possession.
content.13: Thus they gave to the children of Aaron the priest Hebron with her suburbs,
content.14: And Jattir with her suburbs, and Eshtemoa with her suburbs,
content.15: And Holon with her suburbs, and Debir with her suburbs,
content.16: And Ain with her suburbs, and Juttah with her suburbs,
content.17: And out of the tribe of Benjamin, Gibeon with her suburbs, Geba with her suburbs,
content.18: Anathoth with her suburbs, and Almon with her suburbs; four cities.
content.19: All the cities of the children of Aaron, the priests,
content.20: And the families of the children of Kohath, the Levites which remained of the children of Kohath, even they had the cities of their lot out of the tribe of Ephraim.
content.21: For they gave them Shechem with her suburbs in mount Ephraim,
content.22: And Kibzaim with her suburbs, and Beth-horon with her suburbs; four cities.
content.23: And out of the tribe of Dan, Eltekeh with her suburbs, Gibbethon with her suburbs,
content.24: Aijalon with her suburbs, Gath-rimmon with her suburbs; four cities.
content.25: And out of the half tribe of Manasseh, Tanach with her suburbs, and Gath-rimmon with her suburbs; two cities.
content.27: And unto the children of Gershon, of the families of the Levites, out of the
content.28: And out of the tribe of Issachar, Kishon with her suburbs, Dabareh with her suburbs,
content.29: Jarmuth with her suburbs, En-gannim with her suburbs; four cities.
content.30: And out of the tribe of Asher, Mishal with her suburbs, Abdon with her suburbs,
content.31: Helkath with her suburbs, and Rehob with her suburbs; four cities.
content.32: And out of the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with her suburbs,
content.33: All the cities of the Gershonites according to their families
content.34: And unto the families of the children of Merari, the rest of the Levites, out of the tribe of Zebulun, Jokneam with her suburbs, and Kartah with her suburbs,
content.35: Dimnah with her suburbs, Nahalal with her suburbs; four cities.
content.36: And out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer with her suburbs, and Jahazah with her suburbs,
content.37: Kedemoth with her suburbs, and Mephaath with her suburbs; four cities.
content.38: And out of the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with her suburbs,
content.39: Heshbon with her suburbs, Jazer with her suburbs; four cities in all.
